deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 mins
features: 【 Softer Than Soft 】 Did you receive a Comforter like a piece of paper that doesn't look fluffy in the picture? We have improved the proportion of filler fibers (260gsm+40gsm High resilience down alternative )to keep full size bed comforter warm and fluffy even after compression packaging.

【 Feel Free To Roll Under Comforter 】 Fillers NO LONGER Come Together. We sew the down alternative to the surrounding fabric. No more worrying about fillers running around. You just need to enjoy sweet dreams with this comforter for full size bed all season comforter in your bedroom.

【Durable Microfiber And Elegant Seersucker】 Our seersucker comforter is made of durable 100% microfiber and unique seersucker fiber. The full comforter set will revive your bedding in flash with an elegant facade.

【Easy Care】The machine washable seersucker comforter set will save you time. The high resilience down alternative remains fluffy and warm even after many washes. We recommend that you machine wash and dry at a low temperature to prolong the life of the product.

【 What You Get 】3 Pieces full bed comforter sets includes 1 lightweight comforter full size (80"x90") and 2 pillowcases (20"x26'').If you don't like our products, we offer an unconditional refund. You can always contact us with any questions you may have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars In the beginning I was a skeptic. Wow, was I wrong.
reviews.reviewText: When the order arrived I was a little shocked at how small the box was. It was literally the size of shoebox for a pair of boots. Then I opened the first box 📦 only to find an even smaller box. Panic set in. I opened the smaller box to find the comforter and shams vacuumed sealed in plastic. There was a little friendly note from the manufacturer assuring the buyer that as the comforter and shams are used, they will evenly fluff up. They apparently fixed an issue with the filling migrating to one area. It's now pocketed with more filling. I pulled out the comforter and shams and lay them out. The the thickness was that of a plush, luxurious towel. I thought to myself, well, it was an incredible bargain. I guess you get what you pay for. I immediately changed my bedding and there it lay, looking like a quilt. I did some cleaning around my house. I return to my bedroom a few hours later to find that it had become fuller. I pulled the comforter back and remade the bed. As it slowly lowered onto the mattress it was completely puffy. Same happened with the shams. It's been a few weeks now, and it's so fluffy. I washed it in my machine on delicate. I choose to air dry my comforters. It washed so well. As it dried the now familiar fluff returned. Yay me! The size is incredibly generous. My husband is always cold 🥶 I'm always hot 🥵. This is the first time we both are able to enjoy bedding that doesn't freeze him to death or throw me into a hot flash and night sweats. I can't express how totally happy I am with this beautiful comforter set. I'm so impressed with the bargain, beauty, size, maintenance ease, light weight, and of course the fluff. I think I'm going to buy the mustard set. I'm way beyond satisfied!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft & great price
reviews.reviewText: Color was true to photo; material is super soft and warm, but not hot. I got this on sale and couldn’t be happier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality nice, color not as expected
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the sage green which is closer to a mint and a little brighter than actual sage green. Other than that, it's soft, thick but not too heavy. Seems good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely adore this blanket!
reviews.reviewText: Upon arriving I was shocked (and apprehensive) at how small the box was. It was vacuum sealed very tightly. Upon opening I was worried, it was flat and seemed slightly too small for my king bed, but as the directions said I spread it out, fluffed it up, and waited. I was impatient so I threw it in the dryer on low heat, that helped fluff it a bit but it was still quite flat and wrinkled and I was disappointed. that being said after sleeping with it for a day or 2 it fluffed to full capacity and it is absolutely amazing! so soft, light and fluffy, and the color and stitching design is beautiful. I am so happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t fit correctly
reviews.reviewText: I have a king size bed, ordered the comforter for king/california king. when turned horizontally as advertised, it doesn’t cover both sides. When turned vertical it works but I would like a little more blanket. If it wasn’t on sale when I purchased it it wouldn’t be worth it. Not super thick which I would have enjoyed for the weight but still a very comfortable comforter. Color is exactly as pictured and although previously stated that it isn’t very thick it is still warm. It is wrinkly but just as advertised and not in the bad wrinkly way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful bed cover
reviews.reviewText: This comforter is so soft and luxurious. The puckers give it lovely texture. The material is good quality and the filling fluffs up nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for. And at a much cheaper price than some in the stores. Also loved the variety of color options. Most stores were just selling white, gray, and pink. Comes in a very small box. Doesn't look like much when you pull it out. But put it in the dryer for about 5 minutes and it fluffs right up. Love the look of it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not my favorite comforter ever
reviews.reviewText: The quality is okay. I kind of reminded me of sleeping on a sleeping bag. The mustard color wasn’t very pretty either. We don’t even use this because we weren’t big fans of the comforter.
